cause.description:
Run Away forest and veld fires reak havoc and distroy millions in property and live stock!
90% of these fires are caused by ignorant people who throw hot ash away in the bush or dispose of cigarette buts into dry grass.
Help us by joining our cause to prevent forest fires!
1. Forests fires devistate lives
2. Ignorant people claim inocent lives by starting fires
cause.mission: Educate idiots and prevent killer fires
cause.name: Forest Fire Association
